                        long repeatInterval)
Constructs with the specified initial name and repeat interval.

Parameters:
name - the name string
repeatInterval - the scheduler timer repeat interval. The scheduler timer will be activated every the repeat interval

QuartzJobTrigger

public QuartzJobTrigger(String name,
                        int repeatCount,
                        long repeatInterval)
Constructs with the specified initial name, repeat count and repeat interval.

Parameters:
name - the name string
repeatCount - the scheduler timer repeat count. The scheduler timer will stop if the it arrives the repeat count, but it arrives the end time first, it will also stop
repeatInterval - the scheduler timer repeat interval. The scheduler timer will be activated every the repeat interval

QuartzJobTrigger

public QuartzJobTrigger(String name,
                        int[] repeatInterval)
Constructs with the specified initial name and repeat interval.

Parameters:
name - the name string
repeatInterval - the scheduler timer repeat interval and it must be [day, hour, minute, second, milliSecond]. The scheduler timer will be activated every the repeat interval

QuartzJobTrigger

public QuartzJobTrigger(String name,
                        Date startTime,
                        Date endTime,
                        long repeatInterval)
Constructs with the specified initial name, start time, end time and repeat interval.

Parameters:
name - the name string
startTime - the scheduler timer start time. If null, the scheduler timer will start at the currently time
endTime - the scheduler timer end time. If null, the scheduler timer will always run unless it is interrupted
repeatInterval - the scheduler timer repeat interval. The scheduler timer will be activated every the repeat interval
